SRI Maker

Generate Subresource Integrity for your JS/CSS — from URL, file, or pasted code.

SRI Spec Developed by Rohit Chouhan
sha256 sha384 sha512 URL • File • Paste Copy & Embed

Note: Browser security (CORS) may block fetching some third-party URLs. If that happens, download the file and use Upload File, or paste the file’s exact contents.

Provide the public URL where this exact content is hosted to build a ready-to-paste tag.

Combined Integrity (SRI supports multiple algorithms)

Embed Snippet

Heads up
SRI must match the exact bytes the browser downloads. If your server/CDN minifies, compresses, or rewrites content, the hash can change. Always compute the hash from the final, publicly served file.
Verify Integrity
Paste an existing integrity string (e.g., sha384-abc… or multiple space-separated) to check against your current source.

No data ever leaves your browser.
